title: Nanoscale Devices
description: Fundamental properties at the nanoscale for photonics and sensors.  Nanoscale fabrication methods including thin films, ion beam, lithography, electroplating, and example case studies in NEMS/MEMS and photonics.  Credit not allowed for both ME 4766 and MSE 4766.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 3322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3720 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 3450 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 3141 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
